Templates and the like for MIADOC

This directory contains various useful stuff for writing MIADOC manuals in HTML.

MIADOC list

Here is the official
  • List of MIADOC manuals
where you must "allocate" numbers for new manuals.

Templates

These can be used for starting points for manuals
  • template.html
    is an empty document wil appropriate headers etc.
  • styled-menu.html
    is a suggestion on how to present menus in manuals

HTML references

A list of useful links to references on HTML, CSS, JavaScript can be found in
  • htmlref.html

HTML mode for emacs

The build-in SGML mode for emacs can be used for editing HTML as well. I prefer another version instead. You can use it by copying the following
  • html-mode.el
to your home directory and adding something like 
(autoload 'html-mode "html-mode" "HTML major mode." t)
(or (assoc "\\.html$" auto-mode-alist)
  (setq auto-mode-alist (cons '("\\.html$" . html-mode) 
                              auto-mode-alist)))
into your .emacs file.
